channel.title: Need help
channel.description: How can i edit what is dropped when u die in wild. Like right now it is set at random items how can i access them and change them? 508 mithscape source

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Find this in your Player class: (It should be in the reLocatePlayer method.)

if (Engine.players[enemyIndex] != null && !isInDuelArena() && !castleArea() && !CWUnderGround() && !CWUnderGround2()) { Engine.items.createGroundItem(526, 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, p2.username); // drop bones Engine.items.createGroundItem(randomPVPdrop(), 1, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, p2.username); // drop PVP item Engine.items.createGroundItem(995, randomAmm(), this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, p2.username); // drop PVP item } else { System.out.println("[ Anti-Drop system Active ]"); }

Replace it with:

if (Engine.players[enemyIndex] != null && !isInDuelArena() && !castleArea() && !CWUnderGround() && !CWUnderGround2()) { dropStuff(enemyIndex); } else { System.out.println("[ Anti-Drop system Active ]"); }

Read full topic
